attributes.action: Abolish the proposition of extortionate rent to the LOF Shop at WUTH
attributes.background: The league of friends charity shop has been asked to pay £80,000 a year in rent. This shop has provided millions in pounds to the hospital over the years it has ran and has saved many of lives as a result. Stop this locally and nationally!

rejection.details: This decision is the responsibility of the landlord, not the UK Government or Parliament.
